name: Nikita
aboutMe: I am a Junior .NET Developer with professional experience in the IT industry. I am skilled in developing new functionality, writing tests, investigating errors in production, as well as finding and fixing bugs related to them. I have hands-on experience in developing a microservice while transferring a monolithic project to a microservice architecture.Being an individual with well-developed communication skills and curiosity about everything new, I am used to delving deeply into issues in order to meet the task requirements.

responsibilities: Designed project via UML diagrams (Use Case; Class Diagram; DB Diagram; etc.)
Created UI for the whole website via Figma and implemented that via HTML + CSS (Bootstrap 5; Vanilla)
description.aboutProject: A training full-stack web application that provides car rental service using React as a front-end, & monolithic three-layer architecture ASP.NET Web API as Back-end. The main purpose of this app was to learn the developing process, gain knowledge in developing the back-end on ASP.NET, and practice developing React front-end.
description.toolsAndTechnologies: C# 9.0, ASP.NET 5, Web API, MS SQL, Azure, Azure DevOps, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, React, Git/GitHub, Rider, WebStorn DataGrip, Swagger

responsibilities: Attended lectures about .NET and related topics.
reated my own WebAPI pet-project from scratch.
description.aboutProject: AutoHubAPI - Web API that provides monolithic multi-layered architecture Back-End functionality for used cars auction application. The main purpose of this API was to be a playground for me to learn and practice new knowledge.
description.toolsAndTechnologies: .NET 6 & C# 10, ASP.NET Web API, EF Core, JWT, Identity, xUnit, FluentAssertions, AutoFixture, Moq, AutoMapper, FluentValidation, BCrypt, Swagger + SwaggerUI, Swashbuckle

responsibilities: Investigation logs and finding the causes of Warnings and Errors
Creating wiki pages about the investigation
description.toolsAndTechnologies: .NET 6, ASP.NET Web API, MediatR, nUnit, Microservices, MS SQL Server, AWS, Jenkins, Kibana, Grafana, Git/GitLab
